The chunk initializes UI components (scrolled frame, scale, and refresh button) within the MemoryExplorer class constructor.

self.btWidth = DEFAULT_BT_WIDTH

        self.createScrolledFrame()
        self.createScale()
        self.createRefreshBT()

        self.balloon = Pmw.Balloon(self.interior())

    def createScrolledFrame(self):
        self.frame = Pmw.ScrolledFrame(self.interior(),
                                       labelpos = 'n',
                                       label_text = 'ScrolledFrame',
                                       usehullsize = 1,
                                       hull_width = 200,
                                       hull_height = 220,)

        self.frame.pack(padx = 3, pady = 3, fill = tk.BOTH, expand = 1)
